channel.title: Client Opening
channel.description: Hey, I'm using the realm onwards source and client and when I open the client it opens in a (this is not accurate, just example) 100x100 window. The client itself is 105x105, so the logout button and chat options are half cut off. I can, however, drag it open more to see it. How can i fix?
